text: The River Tyne is a river in North East England. It is used for water sports in the summer. More than 43,500 people visit it every year. There is a famous bridge that crosses it called the Tyne Bridge. Another bridge that crosses it is the Gateshead Millennium Bridge. The bridges connect Gateshead to Newcastle upon Tyne. ==References== ==Other websites== * Bridges On The Tyne * Online Charts of The Tyne, to Newcastle * Tyne Rivers Trust Category:Rivers of Cumbria Category:Geography of Tyne and Wear Category:Geography of Northumberland
title: River Tyne
